item.title: Manjaro Cheatsheet
item.description: I’m new to Arch based linuxes and have just decided to try Manjaro 20.0 Here is my reminder page while I get used to installing using pacman insteat of apt Pacman Update sources: sudo pacman -Syy Upgrade packages: sudo pacman -Syu Install package (ensuring system is up to date first to avoid breaking): sudo pacman -Syu package_1 package_2 Install package (Don’t do this!)1: sudo pacman -S package_1 package_2 Remove package:
